Title: 游꿟 The nurses of Yazd protested against the non-payment of their ...
Description: On Monday, the nurses of Yazd held a protest rally in Sadouqi Hospital to protest against the non-payment of their demands. They protested against forced overtime, low salaries, tariffs and non-implementation of laws, hard work and many shifts from being at work. They refused. @iranintltv
